snippet.title: Sonic Origins Plus - Launch Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Sonic Origins Plus is available now on Nintendo Switch: https://nintendo.com/store/products/sonic-origins-plus-switch

This all-in-one bundle includes Sonic Origins and the Plus Expansion Pack. The definitive collection features 12 Sonic Game Gear titles, playable Knuckles in Sonic CD, the Premium Fun Pack, Classic Music Pack, and for the first time, Amy Rose as a playable character in classic Sonic games! 

#NintendoSwitch #SonicOriginsPlus 

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/Nintendo
